data.name: The Ballad Singer - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
CD 1

1) The Ballad Singer - Michael Firmont feat. Jenn Sakura, Jennifer Thomé, Patrick Meyer
2) A Wide Valley - Michael Firmont
3) Abomination - Michael Firmont
4) Into the Woods - Michael Firmont feat. Jennifer Thomé
5) Ancalimo - Michael Firmont feat. Friedrich Busch
6) Better be Prepared - Michael Firmont feat. Laura Moinian
7) Careful, it's dark! - Michael Firmont
8) Main Theme - Michael Firmont feat. Laura Moinian
9) Warrior Queen - Michael Firmont feat. Tori Letzler
10) Cold Stone - Michael Firmont
11) Ancoran - Michael Firmont feat. Laura Moinian, Jennifer Thomé
12) Choose your Weapon - Michael Firmont
13) Dark Lake - Michael Firmont
14) A Thousand Books - Michael Firmont
15) Elemental Kingdom - Michael Firmont feat. Laura Moinian
16) Gladiators - Michael Firmont
17) Home to Leon - Michael Firmont feat. Friedrich Busch
18) Ice & Fire - Michael Firmont
19) A Safe Harbor - Michael Firmont
20) Inevitable! - Michael Firmont
21) Hear her Scream - Michael Firmont
22) Daragast - Michael Firmont feat. Laura Moinian

CD 2

1) Green Bastard - Michael Firmont
2) Into the Alley - Michael Firmont
3) Born out of Chaos - Michael Firmont
4) A Loyal Travel Companion - Michael Firmont
5) Into the Wastelands - Michael Firmont
6) The Last Samurai - Michael Firmont
7) Leon - Michael Firmont feat. Friedrich Busch
8) It's Huge! - Michael Firmont
9) The River Flows - Michael Firmont feat. Laura Moinian
10) Iron & Fire - Michael Firmont
11) Maybe It's Safe? - Michael Firmont
12) Mountain High - Michael Firmont
13) Tavern - Michael Firmont feat. Laura Moinian
14) The Phoenix Wolf - Michael Firmont
15) Into the Dragon's Lair - Michael Firmont feat. Jennifer Thomé
16) The Dragon's Lair - Michael Firmont
17) A Shelter To Be - Michael Firmont
18) Throne Room - Michael Firmont feat. Laura Moinian
19) Too many Heads! - Michael Firmont
20) What a Beautiful Village! - Michael Firmont
21) The Tower - Michael Firmont
